content.raw: I can’t reproduce this using the `X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1` vehicle in the `simple_urban_03` environment. I just traversed around the staging area and had less than a 1 meter error. Please note that the odometry put out by a ground vehicle, such as the X1, only consists of XY and Yaw while there may be some Z variation in the environments that you will have to track to report an artifact within the 5 meter tolerance.
content.html: I can’t reproduce this using the X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 vehicle in the simple_urban_03 environment. I just traversed around the staging area and had less than a 1 meter error. Please note that the odometry put out by a ground vehicle, such as the X1, only consists of XY and Yaw while there may be some Z variation in the environments that you will have to track to report an artifact within the 5 meter tolerance.
